item.itunes:author: Quarterback Factory Show
item.title: Ep. 55: Sixers Exit
item.itunes:subtitle: Ep. 55: Sixers Exit
item.itunes:summary: Ep. 55: Sixers Exit; In this episode... yes, you guessed it.. we berate the sixers, including but not limited to, Ben Simmons, Glenn Rivers, Tobias Harris, even Joel Embiid. Nobody is safe! But at some point we might talk something sensible, you just have to watch and find out when that happens.... just kidding, it's Philly sports, nothing is sensible! We briefly touch how how much the Phillies suck.. And of course, the usual tangents and shenanigans. Go Birds! -- LEAVE A COMMENT-- Follow us on Instagram, twitter and the tik tok @qbfactoryshow -- Call the QBFS Stress Line™ 215-436-9389 and leave a message, we will play it on air! ---- Visit our blog at https://blog.qbfactory.show, and other thoughts and rants of current Philly sports by your favorite group of die hard 4 for 4 fans. -- Email(for business inquiries only):contact@qbfactory.show -...

item.itunes:author: Quarterback Factory Show
item.title: Ep. 52: The Win, The Hawks, and The Ertz Deadline
item.itunes:subtitle: Ep. 52: The Win, The Hawks, and The Ertz Deadline
item.itunes:summary: Ep. 52: The Win, The Hawks, and The Ertz Deadline; In this week's episode we talk about the Sixers win over the 8 seed Washington Wizards. How much more time will Embiid miss? Can Ben consistently dominate? What's the matchup look like in round 2 vs the Hawks. NFL salary cap deadline has come and gone, what does that mean for Ertz moving forward? Will he suit up in 2021? And of course, the usual tangents and shenanigans. Go Birds! -- LEAVE A COMMENT-- Follow us on Instagram and twitter @qbfactoryshow -- Call the QBFS Stress Line™ 215-436-9389 and leave a message, we will play it on air! ---- Visit our blog at https://blog.qbfactory.show, and other thoughts and rants of current Philly sports by your favorite group of die hard 4 for 4 fans. -- Email(for business inquiries only):contact@qbfactory.show -...

item.itunes:author: Quarterback Factory Show
item.title: Ep. 51: The Sixers, the Wizards, and the Popcorn Player
item.itunes:subtitle: Ep. 51: The Sixers, the Wizards, and the Popcorn Player
item.itunes:summary: Ep. 51: The Sixers, the Wizards, and the Popcorn Player; In this week's episode we talk about the Sixers rolling on the Wizards so far can they keep up the domination for a sweep? Or will they take it in 5 or more? It wouldn't be the Quarterback Factory Show if we didn't got on a tangent about some memories from the Vet and other historical moments in Philadelphia sports, good and bad. We also talk a little bit about fan conduct... We're talkin bout popcorn, man! National media wants to focus on something, and Philly gives it to them. Go Birds! -- LEAVE A COMMENT-- Follow us on Instagram and twitter @qbfactoryshow -- Call the QBFS Stress Line™ 215-436-9389 and leave a message, we will play it on air! ---- Visit our blog at https://blog.qbfactory.show, and other thoughts and rants of current Philly sports by your favorite group of die hard 4 for 4 fans. -- Email(for business inquiries only):contact@qbfactory.show -...

item.itunes:author: Quarterback Factory Show
item.title: Ep. 50: Let's talk number one seed Philadelphia 76ers road to the NBA Finals
item.itunes:subtitle: Ep. 50: Let's talk number one seed Philadelphia 76ers road to the NBA Finals
item.itunes:summary: Ep. 50: Let's talk number one seed Philadelphia 76ers road to the NBA Finals; In this week's episode we talk mostly about the #1 seed Philadelphia 76ers and their upcoming round 1 matchup against the #8 seed Washington Wizards. And of course we layout the rest of the playoff road ahead all the way to the parade down broad street!!! If they get to the Finals, who should ring the bell in game 1.. Joel Embiid? Sam Hinkie? Nick Foles? CLAP YOUR HANDS EVERYBODY!!!!!!! We also touch a little bit on the Eagles and the signing of defensive end Ryan Kerrigan. Go Birds! -- LEAVE A COMMENT-- Follow us on Instagram and twitter @qbfactoryshow -- Call the QBFS Stress Line™ 215-436-9389 and leave a message, we will play it on air! ---- Visit our blog at https://blog.qbfactory.show, and other thoughts and rants of current Philly sports by your favorite group of die hard 4 for 4 fans. -- Email(for business inquiries only):contact@qbfactory.show -...
